column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I came here in the month of February when AIC was offering free admission for everyone. It was a little crowded because of this
column2: but it was worth it. There are a lot of famous pieces here
column3: and they're building a new modern wing (I can't wait!!!). It was definitely cool to see famous pieces like "American Gothic
column4: Van Gogh pieces, Renoir, Singer, etc, etc.
